name: RelevantRadio
0:
”Alexa, open Relevant Radio.”
”Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to listen live”
”Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to pray the Joyful Mysteries.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relevant radio
des:
Relevant Radio is Talk Radio for Catholic Life. 
You can tune into what's currently playing on our live stream, browse through our programs, listen to your favorite show host's program and pray along with us.
Once you've enabled the skill, say "Alexa, open Relevant Radio", then follow the prompts from there.

You can also say:
“Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to listen live.” 
“Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to browse programs.” 
"Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to list prayers."
"Alexa, ask Relevant Radio what's playing?"
“Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy.”
“Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to pray the Joyful Mysteries.”
“Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to pray the Sorrowful Mysteries.”
“Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to pray the Glorious Mysteries.”
“Alexa, ask Relevant Radio to pray the Luminous Mysteries.”

While playing a program, you can skip forward to the next archive by saying "Alexa, next." To skip backward to the previous archive, say "Alexa, go back."
To stop audio playback, say "Alexa, turn off Relevant Radio."
For instructions on interacting with this skill, say "help."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
